questions.question: What is the dominant color displayed prominently on the bottle's label?
What specific type of medication is indicated on the label?
What is the primary stated function of this medication, as shown on the label?
What secondary function of this medicine is clearly visible on the label?
What is the shape of the container holding the medication?
What material appears to compose the bottle containing the pills?
What is the overall color of the bottle itself, excluding the label?
What is the indicated dosage of each individual unit inside the bottle?
What is the total number of units contained within the bottle, as printed on the label?
What is the text indicating the target demographic for this medication?
What word describes the strength of this medicine, as explicitly stated on the label?
What brand label is present on the medication bottle?
What is the apparent form in which the medication is packaged?
What is the secondary brand name visible on the packaging?
What is the texture of the medication bottle that is visually apparent?
